about_the_game:
Escape to Sidious is a classic space browser game with a modern twist. At ETS you start the game with a city. You expand them in real time, strengthen your economy, achieve technological edge, trade, forge alliances, expand your fleet to plunder other settlers and take-over or fund new cities to expand your empire. The gameplay is known to many, so what makes ETS special? We have continuously developed ETS and expanded it with many modern elements:

You can work off daily missions to get rewards
You can solve quests, that explain you how to play and provide ressources at the same time
Many little helpers, which make playing easier. E.g. a combat simulator or a fleet planner
An existing diplomacy system that ensures fairness.
These are just the biggest highlights, but of course there is much more to discover in-game, such as a teleporter or, in addition to the trading center, a black market that fully integrates player trading into the game. Everything has been integrated into the game so carefully that it doesn't look as if it's overloaded. ETS is exactly what you are looking for. It offers the full charm of a classic browser game and appears intuitive and modern.

Escape to Sidious is a classic space browser game with a modern twist. At ETS you start the game with a city. You expand them in real time, strengthen your economy, achieve technological edge, trade, forge alliances, expand your fleet to plunder other settlers and take-over or fund new cities to expand your empire. The gameplay is known to many, so what makes ETS special? We have continuously developed ETS and expanded it with many modern elements:

You can work off daily missions to get rewards
You can solve quests, that explain you how to play and provide ressources at the same time
Many little helpers, which make playing easier. E.g. a combat simulator or a fleet planner
An existing diplomacy system that ensures fairness.
These are just the biggest highlights, but of course there is much more to discover in-game, such as a teleporter or, in addition to the trading center, a black market that fully integrates player trading into the game. Everything has been integrated into the game so carefully that it doesn't look as if it's overloaded. ETS is exactly what you are looking for. It offers the full charm of a classic browser game and appears intuitive and modern.
name: Escape to Sidious

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: After Earth's downfall, a new planet must now be colonized and defended against attackers. Explore new technologies and revive trade. Settlers, the future lies ahead. Follow me to a better world. May Iridium be with us!
